name: INTO THE LOOP (itch)
description:
INTO THE LOOP in a 3D platformer-ish game where you are a cube stuck in a monochromatic world of 'THE LOOP'. You travel infinitely in a circle inside of the loop. Dodge obstacles, switch sides, and stay alive. 

Controls: W to jump, S to switch sides, M to toggle showing your cursor. You die from touching spikes, and being pushed back by  blocks.

YouTube video on it being uploaded soon!
